headline: Mdxhealth Announces Closing of Exosome Diagnostics Acquisition from Bio-Techne
summary: Mdxhealth Announces Closing of Exosome Diagnostics Acquisition from Bio-Techne IRVINE, CA, and HERSTAL, BELGIUM – September 15, 2025 (GlobeNewswire) – MDxHealth SA (NASDAQ: MDXH) (the "Company" or "mdxhealth"), a leading precision diagnostics company, today announced the closing of the ExoDx business acquisition from Bio-Techne Corporation, which includes the ExoDx Prostate test. Acquisition of ExoDx Business On August 5, 2025, mdxhealth signed a definitive agreement to acquire Exosome Diagnosti

Acquisition of ExoDx Business On August 5, 2025, mdxhealth signed a definitive agreement to acquire Exosome Diagnosti

headline: Here’s Why The Brown Capital Small Company Fund is Re-Evaluating Bio-Techne’s (TECH) Long-Term Growth Profile
summary: Brown Capital Management, an investment management company, released its “The Brown Capital Management Small Company Fund” second quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The small-cap US stocks rebounded in the second quarter following a challenging first quarter. The Small Company Fund returned 8.59% in the second quarter, lagging […]

headline: Tracking Ron Baron's BAMCO Portfolio - Q2 2025 Update
summary: Ron Baron's BAMCO Inc. 13F portfolio grew to $36.89B in Q2 2025. Check out the top holdings and significant stake increases of the portfolio here.
